review:
I am incredibly grateful to Dr.Preetam for the care he provided to my father following his shoulder bone dislocation from a bike fall. He addressed all our concerns and cleared all fears, doubts  by explaining the entire treatment process and how surgery was not needed, ** ***********  ***** ** ********* **** *******
He is an outstanding doctor who helped my father for the healthy recovery.  I highly recommend Dr.Preetam to anyone in need of orthopedic care.

Thank you for your excellent care doctor.

My experience at Altius hospital, with orthopedic specialist Dr Preetam Raj Chandran was the highly disappointing . The specialist showed little interest, rushed through the consultation, *** **** **** ***** ** *** ******** Allowing another doctor/some hospital staff  * *** **** ***** *** *********to join in and mock our concerns was completely unacceptable. **** ***** ** ***************** ** ******** *** ********** ******* ***** ** *** ****** ********** *******
I'll never ever visit him again. * **** ****** ** ***** ***** ****** ******** *** *** ***** ****** **** *****
